snippet: NASA scrambled on Thursday to figure out what was wrong with a key cooling unit that shut down because of a faulty valve.
abstract: Astronauts aboard the International Space Station dim the lights, turned off unneeded equipment and put off some experiments as NASA scrambles to figure out what was wrong with a key cooling unit that shut down because of a faulty valve.
lead_paragraph: NASA scrambled on Thursday to figure out what was wrong with a key cooling unit that shut down because of a faulty valve.

headline.main: Faulty Valve Puts Limits on Astronauts’ Power Use
headline.print_headline: Faulty Valve Puts Limits On Astronauts’ Power Use
